items.Justification: This paper is about a tokenizer for self-supervised learning of time series data via language models, which is not directly related to adaptive optics or FSOC.
This paper discusses iterative equalization of CPM with unitary approximate message passing, which is related to signal processing but not specifically to adaptive optics or FSOC.
This paper presents a method for high-fidelity waveform generation, which could potentially have applications in FSOC but does not directly address adaptive optics or atmospheric turbulence.
This paper focuses on exponential function reconstruction for biomedical magnetic resonance applications, which is not relevant to adaptive optics or FSOC.
This paper discusses self-supervised scalable deep compressed sensing, which could have broad applications in signal processing but does not directly address adaptive optics or FSOC.
